data.name: Eng resettle Tortuga
data.desc: Elias Watts from Jam resettles Tortuga, under or shortly thereafter receiving commission from Gov of Jam
data.agents_nsp0: Elias Watts and family, Gov William Brayne, James Arundell 10 t 12 people
data.prim_n: Terte 3 126 / Add MS 13992 f 499 / Rawl MSS A. 29 f 500
data.note: in a short time [Watts] gathered about him a colony [at Tortuga] of about 150, both English and French /v Haring 114
